abstract: milano dark chocolate sea salt cookies are now being sold at target .
article: when my friend was in basic training , we used to exchange letters . he would always write about how rough it was , and to cheer him up , i decided to mail him cookies . he loves milano cookies , so i sent him a box . but his staff sergeant ate the whole thing . ugh ! it was so frustrating . however , i 'm glad they were n't the new milano dark chocolate sea salt cookies , because tbh , i probably would 've been the one who ate all my friend 's cookies instead .

i guess the moral of the story is that cookies are too delicious to resist . with milano 's newest flavor , dark chocolate sea salt , my will to ignore those delicious cookies is completely gone . on nov. . 5 , these delicious cookies went on sale exclusively at target . psst -- that means right now . a new holiday season means new flavors milano dark chocolate sea salt cookies is their newest flavor , combining both sweet and saltiness into one irresistible cookie . they come in a fairly small box , which could be easily hidden anywhere , maybe even as a stocking stuffer ?

i 'm sure santa would love if you left these cookies out for him . where can i buy some ? like i said before , the milano dark chocolate sea salt cookies are available at target 's all over the nation . prices may vary depending on location , but they 're retailing with a suggested price tag of $ 3.69 . that 's a steal for cookies this delicious . the milano dark chocolate sea salt cookies are one of many delicious new holiday flavors coming out this season , and i 'm excited to pair all these seasonal flavors together .
prepare yourself , because these target-exclusive cookies are sure to hit the spot .
